channel.title: 2 Errors: NullPointerException and java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space!
channel.description:
I need help with getting this fixed on my server...
Every once and while i will get these errors and i want to know how to fix :)
I can't figure them out, so someone help!
[size=15pt][b] FIXED [/b][/size] [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrameVarSize(stream.java:164) at client.sendMessage(client.java:4320) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:13350) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:13344) at client.process(client.java:7829) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:40) [/code]
[size=13pt][b]NOT FIXED[/b][/size] [code]
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:3831) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:46) at server.run(server.java:135) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2008, 02:33:09 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: 2 Errors: NullPointerException and java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space!
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

I need help with getting this fixed on my server…

Every once and while i will get these errors and i want to know how to fix

I can’t figure them out, so someone help!

[size=15pt]
FIXED
[/size]

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at stream.createFrameVarSize(stream.java:164)
        at client.sendMessage(client.java:4320)
        at client.ApplyDead(client.java:13350)
        at client.ApplyDead(client.java:13344)
        at client.process(client.java:7829)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138)
        at server.main(server.java:40)

[size=13pt]NOT FIXED[/size]

[code]

Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at client.(client.java:3831)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:46)
at server.run(server.java:135)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2008, 02:33:09 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?
